projects.title: Particles and UFO Animation
projects.description: An animation created by using Maya and python code to generate and keyframe polygons (like particles). It features simple clouds, asteroid fields, and procedural trees. Other non-particle elements were created and animated by hand.

projects.title: Hole in the Canoe
projects.description: A Unity game that was made for the CyberCANOE, a 2D/stereoscopic 3D screen developed by Jason Leigh and the LAVA lab. It is a recreation of "Hole in the Wall" that uses Vive controllers and trackers to keep track of the position of the player's limbs.

projects.title: GradGraph
projects.description: A website that visualizes the awarded degree trends and breakdown of three University of Hawaii (UH) campuses. The website utilizes charts from Apache ECharts and Plotly.js.

projects.title: Talking Hands
projects.description: An AR app prototype for training/translating the ASL alphabet. The app was made in Unity with the Meta XR SDK and Unity's XR Hands package.
